== Manish Chakravarty's Home Page ==

I am a 22 year ol computer engineering student from india. I am an RHCE, and also an active GNOME developer.

I first installed linux when i was 14 and have fallen into love with it ever since.
I have been using Ubuntu since their first release, but i became my primary os after the release of Breezy.

I am currently in the process of starting <nowiki>[[Ebuntu ]]</nowiki>, and thus am its current maintainer.
